meanings.definition: The way in which two or more things are not the same.
meanings.sent1: The differenced between the two paintings was in their colors.
meanings.sent2: Spotting the differenced in the twins was challenging for the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The differenced in tastes between the siblings made grocery shopping an adventure.
meanings.sent4: The differenced in opinions created a colorful mosaic of ideas in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The subtle differenced in the fingerprints helped the detective solve the case.

meanings.definition: The result of subtracting one value from another.
meanings.sent1: The differenced between the two numbers was five.
meanings.sent2: Calculating the differenced between the prices was crucial for budgeting.
meanings.sent3: The differenced in scores left the team in suspense until the final whistle.
meanings.sent4: The emotional differenced between the characters added depth to the story.
meanings.sent5: The financial differenced between the options guided her decision-making process.
